projects.name: STRT
projects.excerpt: Mauris blandit, massa vulputate convallis tincidunt, neque purus ornare sapien, sit amet consectetur nisl sem id erat. Morbi at suscipit libero.
projects.content:
STRT is modern, clean and professional multipurpose site template, designed for many kind of websites like business, startup, creative, corporate portfolio, app showcase, promotion, blog, promotion, and many more. This template built with twitter bootstrap v3.3.6, CSS3 and HTML5 code. CSS3 written with SCSS and javascript written with JSON that makes this template easy to customize.

STRT comes with clean structure, professional design and SEO friendly code. The template is fully responsive and perfectly adapted to various screen sizes. It allows you to use it as sale platform as well as an informational one page website that can be viewed perfectly in every devices, such as mobile, tablet and desktop. STRT also integrates with jQuery Waypoints, CSS3 animations to add subtle fade in effect when scrolling, Stellar.js to makes awesome parallax effect, and every form are works perfectly. There is color and background changer for easily change the color between dark or light scheme.
